remarks.format: ## Remarks 靜態類別會公開預設站台地圖提供者的事件。The static class exposes the event of the default site map provider. 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理若要修改的目標 Url，會顯示由站台瀏覽控制項，例如 ASP.NET Web 網頁上的事件控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event on an ASP.NET Web page to modify the target URLs that are displayed by a site navigation control, such as the control. 在此範例中，目前的頁面會是線上電子佈告欄或論壇中張貼頁面。In this example, the current page is a post page in an online bulletin board or forum. 為了呈現更有意義網站巡覽，瀏覽控制項所顯示的節點的 Url 會附加與內容相關的查詢字串。In order to render more meaningful site navigation, the URLs of the nodes that are displayed by the navigation control are appended with query strings that are relevant to the context. > [!NOTE] > 安全地存取屬性從類別。It is safe to access the property from within the class. ASP.NET 網站瀏覽基礎結構可防止無限遞迴時，在此情況下。The ASP.NET site navigation infrastructure guards against infinite recursion, in this case.
